## Checklist

- [ ] I have read the [Contributing Guidelines](../CONTRIBUTING.md)
- [ ] My implementation follows the [datasource-template](https://github.com/locus-search/datasource-template)
- [ ] All four interface methods are implemented
- [ ] Tests are included and passing
- [ ] README.md with setup instructions is included
- [ ] LICENSE file is included
- [ ] No hardcoded credentials
- [ ] Main README.md has been updated
